welcomeText:
We are Connect.Club ‚Äî the app that allows to find your club in the Metaverse.

A few steps left!
welcomeStepsText:
1. Fill out your profile.
2. Send request to a club you find the most relevant.
3. Wait for your join request to be approved by a club administrator.
4. Welcome to the club!
welcomeToClubStepsText:
1. Fill out your profile.
2. Get your join request approved by club administrators.
3. Welcome to the club!
enterPhoneTerms: By entering your number, you agree to our [Terms of Service]({{- terms}}) and [Privacy Policy]({{- privacy}}). Thanks!
enterCodeTitle: Enter the code we sent to you
errorEnterSmsCode: The code is incorrect. Tap to resend and try again.
mainFeedCalendarMoreEventsTitle:
Check the list of upcoming events,
 we have plenty of them!
mainFeedCalendarEmpty:
No future events now.
No worries! Find a live event here.
mainFeedListEmpty:
No active events right now.
Check "Future events" and find one
for you!
exploreClubsText:
Here is the list of clubs based on your interests.
Join any to get access to its events and relevant connections. Club administrators will review your request promptly.
fullNameInputHint: Make sure to use your real name. Thanks!
waitingInviteNotInvitedYet: You have no invite yet. Ask your friends to send you one.
linkCopied: Link is copied to the clipboard
clubRegistrationRequestNote: Club owner or administrators will consider your request promptly. You'll be notified if your request is approved.
pickUsernameInputHint:
We've generated an example of your username.
You can change it or keep it.
pickAvatarChangePhotoHint: Your photo will help other club members to recognize you.

upcomingEventsSubscribeDialogMessage: You have subscribed to the event. We‚Äôll send you a reminder 24 hrs, and 1 hr before, and at the moment it starts.

know you better and hastens your approval

waitingDescription:
Don't know how to get an invite?
Send a request to any of the clubs and their administrators will consider it.
waitingSignIn: Got your invite text? Sign in
checkRequestApproved: Check if your request is approved
reportIncidentScreenDetails: Details about the incident or issue
reportIncidentScreenDescription: Please give us as much context as possible; more details help us conduct investigations faster and more precisely. Attachments are really helpful for violations that are visible in text or photos.
toastRaisedHandRequest: ‚úã {{name}} has something to say. Invite them as a speaker?

toastDisableVideo: 🙈 {{username}} turned off your camera. No worries, just make sure you have no video problems before switching it back on.
toastDisableAudio: 🙊 {{username}} turned off your mic. No worries, just make sure you have no audio problems before switching it back on.

createClubSubtitle: Keep in mind that changing a club name is available only through our support.
